name: Banana Cream Pie V
author: Loretta
summary: Delicious vanilla pudding is made from scratch on the stove top, then layered in a deep dish pie shell with banana slices. The pie is then covered with meringue and toasted in the oven.
ingredients: 1 (9 inch) deep dish pie crust, baked and cooled
directions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C
) Combine sugar, cornstarch, and salt for custard in a large saucepan or double boiler until well mixed
Stir in milk and egg yolks; whisk until all ingredients are thoroughly combined
Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, until mixture is thickened
Remove from heat and stir in butter and vanilla
Pour 1/2 of the custard into baked pie shell
Spread remaining custard over banana layer
Beat egg whites and cream of tartar for meringue topping in a large glass or metal mixing bowl until foamy
Gradually add sugar, continuing to beat until stiff peaks form
Spread meringue over pie, covering completely
Bake in the preheated oven for 10 to 15 minutes, or until lightly browned
